videoJson.name: Hi8
videoJson.fact1: Hi8 decks are typically backwards compatible, which means they can also play the older Video8 format
videoJson.fact2: The Hi8 format was developed as an improvement to the Video8 format, with greater bandwidth for the brightness levels, but no increase to color resolution
videoJson.fact3: Some professional Hi8 equipment could store additional digital stereo PCM sound on a special reserved track
